multi_topic_discovery.topic_discovery_motivation: Impact: equities; Indian equities are poised for volatility as global risk‑off sentiment and GST tax‑cut expectations influence consumer stocks.

category.motivation: The article discusses the GST Council’s upcoming meeting on planned tax cuts, which constitutes a regulatory change affecting Indian equities.

impact.motivation: The article reports risk‑off sentiment and an upcoming GST Council meeting that are likely to influence Indian equity markets, directly impacting the node on Indian equities/Nifty.

time_frame.motivation: The article centers on immediate market sentiment and an upcoming GST Council meeting, both short‑term catalysts for Indian equities.

article_node.title: Investors Cozy Up to Safer Bets in Indian Stock Market as Tariff Pain Looms
article_node.summary: Indian equities are expected to experience volatility as risk‑off sentiment from Wall Street and sluggish Asian markets drives investors toward safer bets. Nifty futures are already lower, and the focus is on consumer stocks ahead of the GST Council’s two‑day meeting on planned tax cuts.
